feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 09:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: SSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow or periods of rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or periods of rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
